name: Martial Arts for the Performative Soul
name_original: Martial Arts for the Performative Soul
description:
As you feel your emotions well within you, what do you do?

Do you scream out loud?

Do you write it down on a piece of paper?

Do you get it out via other means?

Well join our theater troupe and express your emotions - with your fists.

Martial Arts for the Performative Soul

written  and designed for Asian Martial Arts Jam by Zuhayri Mohamed

written as part of Analog Dreams led by Ben @SwordsandFlowers

Cover image provided by Brooke Cagle on Unsplash.com
